name: Verdant City
description: A lush city built where the great forest meets fertile farmlands. Green terraced gardens rise up the hillsides, and the scent of blooming flowers fills the air. This is a center of learning and nature magic.

center.name: Garden Plaza
center.description: The city center is a magnificent botanical garden with fountains, rare flowers, and ancient trees. Scholars and druids walk peaceful paths between schools and libraries.

buildings.name: The Verdant Archives
buildings.description: A massive library specializing in natural philosophy and druidic lore.

buildings.name: Circle of the Ancient Oak
buildings.description: The headquarters of the region's druid circle, built around a massive ancient oak.

buildings.name: Garden of Remedies
buildings.description: A market specializing in medicinal herbs and natural remedies.

north.name: Forest Quarter
north.description: The northern district blends seamlessly with the great forest. Tree-houses and elevated walkways connect buildings built among the ancient trees.

buildings.name: Forest Rangers Lodge
buildings.description: The headquarters for forest rangers who protect the woodland paths.

west.name: Artisan Quarter
west.description: The western district houses craftsmen who work with natural materials. Woodcarvers, weavers, and botanical alchemists create beautiful and useful items.

buildings.name: Living Wood Workshop
buildings.description: A workshop where artisans craft items from living wood and natural materials.

south.name: Coastal Road
south.description: The southern district opens onto the road leading to the coast. Sea breezes carry the salt scent inland, mixing with the forest aromas.

buildings.name: Seaside Trading Post
buildings.description: Traders who specialize in goods from both forest and sea.
